OPERATION.COMMENT: load project directory automatically if Visum Instance is opened via double click

EXECUTESCRIPTPARA.INTERNALSCRIPTCODE:
from pathlib import Path
# path to opened Visum file (filenamepath), cut level to main folder level folder_path = Path(Visum.UserPreferences.DocumentName).parents[1] # set all project directory paths to main to main folder level Visum.SetAllPaths(folder_path)
# specify project directory type, set path to sub folder Visum.SetPath(1, folder_path / 'Net') Visum.SetPath(2, folder_path / 'Version') Visum.SetPath(8, folder_path / 'Graphigparameter') Visum.SetPath(15, folder_path / 'Attributes') Visum.SetPath(69, folder_path / 'Matrix') Visum.SetPath(21, folder_path / 'Filter')
''' specify project directory type, set path to sub uni folder '''
Visum.SetPath(37, folder_path.parent) # scripts Visum.SetPath(12, folder_path.parent) # procedure settings file

# ====== Functions ========
## Adds a user-defined attribute only if it not yet exists # @param [in] collection: Visum collection of network objects of the desired types (like Visum.Net.Links) # @param [in] name: Name and Code of the Attribute to create # @param [in] value_type: ValueType for the Attribute to create, either correct internal values from Visum or string ("int"/"float") # @param [in] default_value: (Optional) Default Value existing objects and newly created objets should get in this attribute # @param [in] default_value: (Optional) Formula (as string) for Formula Attribute # @author JZ def addUDA(collection, name, value_type, default_value = None, formula = None): '''sample call: addUDA(Visum.Net.Links, "VFS", "int", default_value = 5) ''' if isinstance(value_type, str): value_type = value_type.lower() if value_type in {"int", "integer"}: value_type = 1 elif value_type in {"real", "float", "double"}: value_type = 2 elif value_type in {"str", "string", "text"}: value_type = 5 elif value_type in {"long_text", "long_string", "string_long"}: value_type = 62 elif value_type in {"bool", "boolean", "true_false"}: value_type = 9 elif value_type in {"time_point", "timepoint", "uhrzeit"}: value_type = 7 elif value_type in {"duration", "time_duration", "zeitdauer"}: value_type = 6 if not name in {q.Code for q in collection.Attributes.GetAll}: if formula: collection.AddUserDefinedAttribute(name, name, name, value_type, Formula=formula) elif default_value: collection.AddUserDefinedAttribute(name, name, name, value_type, DefVal=default_value) else: collection.AddUserDefinedAttribute(name, name, name, value_type)
def open_visum(name): try: ''' VisumStart - enables the usage in the procedure sequence or as Visum instance - name of the Visum version that is opened ''' global Visum Visum name = Visum.UserPreferences.DocumentName except NameError: import win32com.client as com print('initialize visum instance') Visum = com.Dispatch("Visum.Visum.200") print('open visum file: {}'.format(name)) Visum.LoadVersion(name) print('erfolgreich geladen')
return Visum # ====== Core ==========
str_version = r"E:\Seafile\01_Interface\01_example\Version\example_stuttgart_teilnetz.ver" Visum = open_visum(str_version)
# insert UDA data here # format: [name, object, data type] # e.g: ["dummy", "links", "float"] list_UDA = [["scenario_name", Visum.Net, "str"], ["instance_name", Visum.Net, "str"], ["lintim_period_length", Visum.Net, "int"], ["lintim_time_units_per_minute", Visum.Net, "int"], ["lintim_base_unit_for_headway", Visum.Net, "int"], ["lintim_defdwelltime", Visum.Net, "int"], ["lintim_prepreptime", Visum.Net, "int"], ["lintim_postpreptime", Visum.Net, "int"], ["lintim_tsys_for_adapting", Visum.Net, "str"], ["lintim_walktime_utility", Visum.Net, "float"], ["lintim_transfer_utility", Visum.Net, "int"], ["lintim_min_transfertime", Visum.Net, "int"], ["internal_vol", Visum.Net.Links, "float"], ["is_Terminal", Visum.Net.StopPoints, "bool"], ["is_Transfer", Visum.Net.StopPoints, "bool"], ["V_SYS_TMP", Visum.Net.Links, "str"] ]
for uda in list_UDA: addUDA(uda[1], uda[0], uda[2])

OPERATION.COMMENT: set UDA is_Terminal if it's not set yet
set UDA is_Transfer if it's not set yet
set defined dwell time if it's not set yet
create folder for files for lintim instance

EXECUTESCRIPTPARA.INTERNALSCRIPTCODE:
import os
sep_directory = "\\"
folder_path =Visum.GetPath(2).rsplit(sep_directory, 2)[0] # path to opened Visum file (filenamepath), cut level to main folder level
name_instance = Visum.Net.AttValue("instance_name") name_scenario = Visum.Net.AttValue("scenario_name")
folder_interface = sep_directory.join([folder_path, "_Interface"]) folder_visum2lintim = sep_directory.join([folder_interface, "Visum2Lintim", name_scenario + "_" + name_instance]) folder_lintim2visum = sep_directory.join([folder_interface, "Lintim2Visum"])
# create folder # os.makedirs(folder_att, exist_ok=True) os.makedirs(folder_visum2lintim, exist_ok=True) os.makedirs(folder_lintim2visum, exist_ok=True)

from pathlib import Path
VehUnitList = Visum.Workbench.Lists.CreateVehUnitList # create VehUnitList, # VehUnitList.Show() VehUnitList.AddColumn("TSysSet") VehUnitList.AddColumn("TotalCap") VehUnitList.AddColumn("CostRateHourService") VehUnitList.AddColumn("CostRateHourEmpty") VehUnitList.AddColumn("CostRateKmService") VehUnitList.AddColumn("CostRateKmEmpty") VehUnitList.AddColumn("CostRateVehUnit")
name_scenario = Visum.Net.AttValue("scenario_name")
# path to Visum file (filenamepath), cut level to main folder level folder_path = Path(Visum.UserPreferences.DocumentName).parents[1]
name_instance = Visum.Net.AttValue("instance_name") name_scenario = Visum.Net.AttValue("scenario_name")
folder_interface = folder_path / "_Interface" folder_visum2lintim = folder_interface / "Visum2Lintim" folder_att = folder_visum2lintim / (name_scenario + "_" + name_instance)
file= folder_att / "veh_units.att" # file and directory
VehUnitList.SaveToAttributeFile(FileName=file , Separator=59) # 59 = semicolon

OPERATION.COMMENT: save .net: Node (No, Coord), StopPoint (No, NodeNo, DEFDWELLTIME;IS_TERMINAL;IS_TRANSFER), Links (FROMNODENO, LENGTH, NO, TONODENO, TSYSSET, T_PUTSYS(B))

EXECUTESCRIPTPARA.INTERNALSCRIPTCODE:
from pathlib import Path
name_scenario = Visum.Net.AttValue("scenario_name")
# path to Visum file (filenamepath), cut level to main folder level folder_path = Path(Visum.UserPreferences.DocumentName).parents[1] filepath_net = Visum.GetPath(1)
name_instance = Visum.Net.AttValue("instance_name") name_scenario = Visum.Net.AttValue("scenario_name")
folder_interface = folder_path / "_Interface" folder_visum2lintim = folder_interface / "Visum2Lintim" folder_net = folder_visum2lintim / (name_scenario + "_" + name_instance)
output= folder_net /"config.net" # file and directory layout = filepath_net + "layout_config.net" # layout-file
Visum.IO.SaveNet(NetFile=output, LayoutFile=layout)

from pathlib import Path
Path_mtx = Visum.GetPath(69) # 69 = Matrix
folder_path = Path(Visum.GetPath(15)).parent
name_instance = Visum.Net.AttValue("instance_name") name_scenario = Visum.Net.AttValue("scenario_name")
folder_interface = folder_path / "_Interface" folder_visum2lintim = folder_interface / "Visum2Lintim" folder_att = folder_visum2lintim / (name_scenario + "_" + name_instance)
output= folder_att / "od.att" # file and directory
with open(Path_mtx + "od.mtx", "r", encoding="utf-8") as f: content = f.readlines()
idx_start = content.index("\ufeff$O;D3\n") + 8 idx_end = content.index("$NAMES\n")
del content[idx_end-1:] del content[0:idx_start]
header = "$ODPAIR:FROMZONENO;TOZONENO;DEMAND\n" with open(output, "w", encoding="utf-8") as f: f.write(header) for row in content: row = ";".join(row.split()) f.write(row + "\n")

OPERATION.COMMENT: Calculate walk time for LinTim (Zones to Zones and Zones to Stops)

GROUPPARA.NAME: Gruppe Calculate walk time for LinTim (Zones to Zones and Zones to Stops)
